  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x126
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x126
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x102
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 442x19
          text run at (0,0) width 442: "The three boxes below should have progressively thinner bottom borders."
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,36) size 64x66 [color=#000080]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 64x66
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 64x62
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 19x62 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]

                  text run at (3,3) width 11: "A"

                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 10x19
                  text run at (3,3) width 10: "B"
